snippet.title: BCB(asic) a BASIC c64 game   by!NG73 inspired to BC's Quest For Tires.
snippet.description:
I wanted to write a simplified BASICV2 version of one of my favorite games for the Commodore64: BC's quest for Tires.
Help the caveman reach his beloved by crossing a territory full of dangers.
Run on the wheel, jump and duck to avoid obstacles, such as holes, branches, rocks, etc. that will present themselves along the way.

Use the joystick in port 2 to play; move the joystick to the right to accelerate when you have a flat tire; lever down to lower your head to avoid tree branches and stalactites;lever up to jump.

Accumulate points and overcome all obstacles to reach your woman!
